beauty.Name: Dove Foaming Body Wash, Body Wash for All Skin Types
beauty.Description: DOVE MANGO BUTTER FOAMING BODY WASH This rich bodywash is made with mango butter to moisturize dry skin and give you a pampered spa-like experience every time you shower.

beauty.Name: Solimo Morning Fresh Facial Cleanser with Ginseng and Vitamin C, 8 fl oz
beauty.Description: One 8-fluid ounce bottle of Solimo Morning Fresh Facial Cleanser with ginseng, vitamin C and non-plastic cellulose beads.

beauty.Name: Anti Aging Serum 3-Pack for Face - Vitamin C
beauty.Description: A HIGHER FORM OF ACTIVE, BIO-AVAILABLE VITAMIN C, our Vitamin C Serum combines many natural and organic ingredients in such a way that your face feels smooth and refreshed the moment it touches your skin.
